content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

I can see two distinct structures in the main target image:

## Structure 1 (Left Tower)
- Total blocks: 6
- Layers: 4
- Components from bottom to top:
  - Base: Red arch/bridge-like piece with a hole
  - Middle: Two orange cylindrical pillars standing vertically
  - Two horizontal yellow rectangular blocks (one at the bottom of pillars, one at the top)
  - Top: Orange triangular prism

## Structure 2 (Right House)
- Total blocks: 4
- Layers: 3
- Components:
  - Base: Two orange triangular prisms forming a roof-like structure with a blue cube in between
  - Top: Green horizontal rectangular block with an orange triangular prism on top

# Required Blocks from the Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Left Tower):
- Block #2 (red arch)
- Block #7 and #8 (yellow horizontal rectangular blocks)
- Block #10 (vertical orange cylinder) - used twice
- Block #14 (orange triangular prism)

For Structure 2 (Right House):
- Block #3 (blue cube)
- Block #4 (green horizontal rectangular block)
- Block #14 (orange triangular prism) - used twice

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2
    Step2: Move block with index 7
    Step3: Move block with index 10
    Step4: Move block with index 10
    Step5: Move block with index 8
    Step6: Move block with index 14
    Step7: Move block with index 14
    Step8: Move block with index 14
    Step9: Move block with index 3
    Step10: Move block with index 4
}
```

This will create both structures: first the tower on the left (steps 1-6), and then the house-like structure on the right (steps 7-10).
